name: ADVANCED MEDICAL ADMINISTRATION, LLC
sampleDescriptions: Support reimbursements for skin substitute products. Support HR. 5768/S. 2561, To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to adjust payment for skin substitute products under the Medicare program
